title: ALTA Rack’s Hammock Stand turns hitch-mount bike rack into a resting place
content:
At the last Interbike ever, a hammock caught our attention. Specifically, it was a hammock attached to a stand integrated into an ALTA bike rack. At that point, the rack was the big story since the hammock stand and lift gate table were still in the prototype phase. But now it’s official – with ALTA’s […]

The post ALTA Rack’s Hammock Stand turns hitch-mount bike rack into a resting place appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
